snippet.title: despelote - slice of life trailer - early 2025
snippet.description:
despelote is now set to kickoff in early 2025! Enjoy a new trailer for this wonderful slice-of-life adventure. Wishlist it on Steam: https://s.team/a/2367820/
A game by Julián Cordero and Sebastián Valbuena. Produced by Gabe Cuzzillo, with sound design by Ian Berman. Programming by Niall Tessier-Lavigne. Presented by Panic. Coming Early 2025 to PS5, PS4, Xbox, and PC.
https://despelote.game/
Find it on PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007987
